data.name: PrintOptions
desc: describes the options for print jobs.
These options are only valid for a single print job. They do not change layout or formatting of the document.

properties.name: Collate
desc: advises the printer to collate the pages of the copies.

properties.name: CopyCount
desc: specifies the number of copies to print.

properties.name: DuplexMode
desc: determines the duplex mode for the print job.

properties.name: FileName
desc: if set, specifies the name of a file to print to.

properties.name: Pages
desc: This range is given as at the user interface. For example: \"1-4;10\" to print the pages 1 to 4 and 10.

properties.name: PrinterName
desc: if set, specifies name of the printer to use.

properties.name: SinglePrintJobs
desc: advises the printer to create a single print job for each copy.

properties.name: Sort
desc: advises the printer to sort the pages of the copies.

properties.name: Wait
desc: if set to TRUE, the corresponding XPrintable.print() request will be executed synchronous.
